review: I bought this after I bought a EZCast HDMI media streamer because I was hoping it was going to be so much better than the EZcast. Fact is it won't even work on my Sanyo TV, I bought the TV in 2011 and I know its an older model. On that same note, It works on an even older model Emerson with no problems what so ever?  I browsed the online help and talked with some people and did all the tricks they said to do I still can not get it to work on my Sanyo.When it streams I don't have any issues with buffering or anything like that, its just frustrating I can't use it in the livingroom like I had intended.
author: Cynthia Jones "Tech Junkie"

review: Any TV that has an HDMI port works with Chromecast. It streams the commonly used streaming apps like Netflix, Youtube, Hulu in FHD (1080p) from a device. Besides streaming, my favorite feature is playing Chromecast games like Monopoly Dash, Scrabble Blitz, and  Just Dance Now. It has been working flawlessly for me since 2013.
